meanings.definition: Consisting of four subunits or parts.
meanings.sent1: The toy car was tetrameric, with four detachable wheels.
meanings.sent2: The flower had a tetrameric structure, with four identical petals.
meanings.sent3: The tetrameric puzzle was challenging to solve, as each piece looked the same.
meanings.sent4: Her tetrameric approach to problem-solving involved breaking tasks into four equal parts.
meanings.sent5: The tetrameric pattern on the wallpaper made the room feel balanced and harmonious.

meanings.definition: Formed by the combination of four molecules.
meanings.sent1: The scientist discovered a tetrameric compound in the lab, made of four unique molecules.
meanings.sent2: The medication was tetrameric, consisting of four essential components.
meanings.sent3: The tetrameric mixture bubbled and fizzed in the beaker, creating a colorful display.
meanings.sent4: The tetrameric bond between the atoms was strong, holding the structure together.
meanings.sent5: The tetrameric fragrance of the perfume blended four distinct scents seamlessly.
